::Shadow Wing::

She get hit with the fire balls and catches fire.  She dives down 
tothe ground and rolls to extinguish the flames.  Badly burnt, get to 
her knees slowly. Cuts now filled with dirt and in emense pain from 
the burns.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> Serpentor/Pyro:
> 
> 
> 
> Serpentor sidestepped, a blast digging into his right thigh.  He 
> replaced his plasma rifle with a plasma launcher, not happy.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro stumbled back as blasts collided with has abdomen.  Gripping 
the 
> injured space with his free hand, he fired off two fire balls from 
> his flame cannon at Shadow Wing.
